properties.name: 1. The adventure starts in Maui, Hawaii
properties.description: Posted by 82537111Maui I was born in Maui, Hawaii April 28, 1993, the daughter of a submarine commander. When the submarine was in port, my little brother and I could go visit and play on board. We went down in the sea and suddenly decided to go on a journey to four places in North America; first stop being Walt Disney World in Florida. By the way, my mother is the submarine commander.

properties.name: 2. Next stop Walt Disney World Orlando Florida
properties.description: Posted by 82537111 When we arrived at Walt Disney World, my brother and I looked out the porthole of the submarine and saw Arial and her father swimming by to go to the Magic Kingdom for Cinderellaâ€™s Birthday. We decided to follow behind and join in. Later, we walked through the Magic Kingdom and saw all the characters were waiting to greet us.

properties.name: 3. Next stop Elgin Illinois
properties.description: Posted by 82537111 At the Magic Kingdom they were offering hot air balloon rides and we decided to try it. Upward we went and suddenly we were caught in a strong windstorm that blew us northwest. We came down the next day in a cornfield, and later we found that we were in Elgin Illinois. A nearby farmer took us to the train station on his large tractor.

properties.name: 4. Next stop Montreal Canada
properties.description: Posted by 82537111We next took a train to Montreal, Canada. A passenger on the train told us about a famous ballerina performing at the Sanger Theater in Montreal. We went to the performance and were amazed. Afterwards we went back stage and met the prima ballerina, and later asked her out for a cup of salad. ( I have heard that ballerinas only eat two cups of salad and fruit everyday). A good time was had by all!

properties.name: 5. Last stop Manhattan New York, then back home to Maui
properties.description: Posted by 82537111 Knowing that there were many Broadway shows in New York, we took the subway to Manhattan. After seeing Hairspray, Wicked, The Lion King, Rent, Chicago, Phantom of the Opera, and Beauty and the Beast, we knew the shows were all great. After each evening performance we met the actors and actresses, then later went out to dinner. My most favorite restaurant was Bubba Gump Shrimp. After this exciting journey we knew it was time to head back to Maui. We hopped on the plane, and before you knew we were back on the ground in Maui, Hawaii.

properties.name: 6. Back home in Maui Hawaii
properties.description: Posted by 82537111 We returned back home safely from our adventure. A great time was had by the family!
